column4: hi there. how can i revert back to my Intel graphics? Note: After installation it was Intel already supported, then i installed nVidia through Addinitional Drivers, and it did not support as usual (Optimus) and now im stucked with nouveau
have you tried removing the nvidia driver and blacklisting nouveau?
thanks for respond, I did not remove nVidia, but disabled driver from Additional Drivers.
now should I apply those commands above or sth else ?
